statements: SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id > 1 AND project_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id > 2 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email FROM backer WHERE backer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM project JOIN backer ON project.project_id = backer.project_id WHERE backer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_id, project_name, backer_name FROM project LEFT JOIN backer ON project.project_id = backer.project_id ORDER BY project_id ASC, backer_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(backer_id) AS backers_count FROM projects LEFT JOIN backers ON projects.project_id = backers.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, backer_name, email FROM projects INNER JOIN backers ON projects.project_id = backers.project_id ORDER BY project_name ASC, backer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, backer_name, email FROM projects p INNER JOIN backers b ON p.project_id = b.project_id WHERE b.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(b.backer_id) AS backers_count FROM projects p LEFT JOIN backers b ON p.project_id = b.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(b.backer_id) > 5;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(b.backer_id) AS backers_count FROM projects p LEFT JOIN backers b ON p.project_id = b.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY backers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM backer WHERE backer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT backer_name, backer_email FROM backer ORDER BY backer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, backer_name FROM project JOIN project_backer ON project.project_id = project_backer.project_id JOIN backer ON project_backer.backer_id = backer.backer_id;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(backer_id) AS Backers_Count FROM project_backer GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY Backers_Count DESC;
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_description LIKE '%important%' AND project_name ILIKE 'Project%' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project;
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_deadline >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT backer_name, backer_email FROM backer WHERE backer_phone IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, project_deadline FROM project ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT backer_name, backer_phone FROM backer ORDER BY backer_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_deadline FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backer WHERE backer_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_deadline FROM project ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT backer_id, backer_name, backer_email FROM backer WHERE backer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM project JOIN backer ON project.project_id = backer.backer_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT backer_name, backer_email, backer_phone FROM backers WHERE backer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, backer_id FROM project_backers WHERE backer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM projects WHERE project_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, backer_name FROM projects JOIN project_backers ON projects.project_id = project_backers.project_id JOIN backers ON project_backers.backer_id = backers.backer_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(backer_id) AS num_backers FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_backers ON projects.project_id = project_backers.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_end_date < '2022-01-01';
